name: tree-sitter-ccl
description: Tree-sitter grammar for CCL (Categorical Configuration Language)
author: CCL Community

scripts.build:cli:darwin: mkdir -p ~/.cache/tree-sitter/lib && gcc -c -fPIC src/parser.c -I./src -o /tmp/ccl_parser.o && g++ -c -fPIC -std=c++20 -stdlib=libc++ -isystem /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include/c++/v1 src/scanner.cc -I./src -o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o && g++ -shared -o ~/.cache/tree-sitter/lib/ccl.so /tmp/ccl_parser.o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o && rm -f /tmp/ccl_parser.o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o
scripts.build:cli:linux: mkdir -p ~/.cache/tree-sitter/lib && gcc -c -fPIC src/parser.c -I./src -o /tmp/ccl_parser.o && g++ -c -fPIC -std=c++20 src/scanner.cc -I./src -o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o && g++ -shared -o ~/.cache/tree-sitter/lib/ccl.so /tmp/ccl_parser.o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o && rm -f /tmp/ccl_parser.o /tmp/ccl_scanner.o
